text:
[smallbatch-frontend/] 4 new commits:
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/52505fb2e40e63c62ea317e32fb2eb38937b5879|52505fb2e40e>: Added footer image to eats.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/ac758c887a8bfd4459e4546008a812283bb22437|ac758c887a8b>: Add footer bg to home and beers.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/91b5d08409dedcf84482ade0d5977aab85f1f286|91b5d08409de>: Remove dummy content from eats view
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/ceff20ff98fde1164df04eb540563ea5e00eef53|ceff20ff98fd>: Remove addthis.
 - Gaston Figueroa

[smallbatch-frontend/] 8 new commits:
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/badf1712b57ee2c712ab3d59bde39f0cc7bdcbaf|badf1712b57e>: Change share this drink asset on cocktails.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/c4f49ff007fb25ac42d3e36f0b8b6c71347f17b0|c4f49ff007fb>: Fix cocktails header and intro.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/260ce1373d05019db485b3b4a16a2028038c7b8a|260ce1373d05>: Link beers on tap to home on desktop.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/40fec956c6b5cf551d9c3024a7d08245dbf13589|40fec956c6b5>: Replace home intro asset with typo.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/941ecc3fba73d19915984a39e762fc5c9621bca3|941ecc3fba73>: Add favicon.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/c9212683788bb6fcc8ccb7e3f5b53e6e1a0fa311|c9212683788b>: Optimize bg image.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/c1ade6e20da35e9ee56e899cbb0cda65528e435e|c1ade6e20da3>: Add archive page.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/b0425237e693c96423b524fee78745235198152d|b0425237e693>: Style acrhive>bring it back type.
 - Gaston Figueroa

[smallbatch-frontend/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/8e3795859c6f9cca1f2203f77a2857f16d606ee5|8e3795859c6f>: Add archive page title and rule after beer desc.
 - Gaston Figueroa
<@U026AP8CM> I think the client may need to trim their copy for the archive page
A file was shared
Will send a note. Thanks!
Thanks.
fyi i think that ’s all copy i grabbed from their old site and put in the cms unless the client’s been in there adding beers to the archive
regardless tho we should tell them to watch out for that
Good point. The designer designed the blocks for this copy
A file was shared
how nice that exact length of text looks
Ha. And because everything is custom images we can't just have the box stretch gracefully if the copy is longer.
is that box an image?
Yes
ack
There's no way to "code" this without an image. Unless we want to use something like D3 but that would be WAY outside our scope.
<@U026AP8CM> I also have another question: On your email re: social media share the client mentioned they're using addthis on the current site.
I was wondering if that was a requirement or if we could use something (a custom thing that we have used on other projects).
Addthis has too much baggage and may affect load times. Our solution is simpler but I wasn't sure if they were tracking usage with addthis.
just seeing these
catching up now
<@U02618EV1>: use your solution.
i can confirm they aren't using addthis to track anything. i'll send a note to the client that letting them know we have solution that keeps load times better
and let you know
:joy:
Thanks.

[smallbatch-frontend/] 2 new commits:
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/3bf37cb5ca51d3700364fc2e9f1a282078bddd3b|3bf37cb5ca51>: Longer archive blocks.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/564762dbbc7da78b00e9de7c3242cd06a4f5449e|564762dbbc7d>: Fix home>brewing now bug.
 - Gaston Figueroa
<@U026AP8CM> that emails mentions refresh rate. Do they mean that the site will automatically update the levels?
we talked about real time not being in scope
That's what I thought but I wondering if the client expects that based on the email.
right
i had the same thoughts
hoping <@U026PHQ3J>  sees this and can chime in to this point (post jordan)
contract does not state we are building beer levels in real time

it was previously discussed internally <@U026PHQ3J> included and we discussed that it was stupid for lack of a better word right now to have beer levels update every ~10 seconds or so because who is sitting there watching beer levels rise? refreshing the page will refresh the beer levels and show you an update on numbers if there is one.
Makes sense.
Out of curiosity, what does the contract say about animation of beer levels?
in what regard
just animation in general?
can take a look
Yes and thanks.
it says simple animations
will take a screen shot of the section and send to you via email
or actually can place here
Oh, so it says there that the layout will shift as we collapse the screen but I thought we said not responsive.
